verses.verse: <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> are <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H6275>transcribed.<s%>

[As] the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> for <S%H7312>height<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H6011>depth,<s%> So the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> is <S%H369>unsearchable.<s%> <S%H2714><s%>
<S%H1898>Take<s%> <S%H1898>away<s%> the <S%H5509>dross<s%> from the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> And there <S%H3318>comes<s%> out a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> for the <S%H6884>smith;<s%>

<S%H1898>Take<s%> <S%H1898>away<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> [from] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> And his <S%H3678>throne<s%> will be <S%H3559>established<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>
Do not <S%H1921>claim<s%> <S%H1921>honor<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> And do not <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>men;<s%>

For it is <S%H2896>better<s%> that it be <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H5927>"Come<s%> up <S%H2008>here,<s%>" <S%H4480>Than<s%> that you should be <S%H8213>put<s%> <S%H8213>lower<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince,<s%> <S%H834>Whom<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen.<s%>

Do not <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H4118>hastily<s%> to <S%H7378>argue<s%> [your case;] <S%H6435>Otherwise,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> will you <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H319>end,<s%> When your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H3637>puts<s%> you to <S%H3637>shame<s%>?
<S%H7378>Argue<s%> your <S%H7379>case<s%> with your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> And do not <S%H1540>reveal<s%> the <S%H5475>secret<s%> of <S%H312>another,<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> he who <S%H8085>hears<s%> [it] <S%H9154>reproach<s%> you, And the <S%H1681>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> about you not <S%H7725>pass<s%> <S%H7725>away.<s%>
[Like] <S%H8598>apples<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in <S%H4906>settings<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> Is a <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in right <S%H655>circumstances.<s%>

[Like] an <S%H5141>earring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and an <S%H2481>ornament<s%> of <S%H3800>fine<s%> <S%H3800>gold<s%> Is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3198>reprover<s%> to a <S%H8085>listening<s%> <S%H241>ear.<s%>

Like the <S%H9491>cold<s%> of <S%H7950>snow<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%> Is a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6735>messenger<s%> to those who <S%H7971>send<s%> him, For he <S%H7725>refreshes<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of his <S%H113>masters.<s%>
[Like] <S%H9347>clouds<s%> and <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> Is a <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H1984>boasts<s%> of his <S%H4991>gifts<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>
By <S%H753>forbearance<s%> <S%H639><s%> a <S%H7101>ruler<s%> may be <S%H6601>persuaded,<s%> And a <S%H7390>soft<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H7665>breaks<s%> the <S%H1634>bone.<s%>

Have you <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%>? <S%H398>Eat<s%> [only] <S%H1767>what<s%> you <S%H1767>need,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> you <S%H7646>have<s%> it in <S%H7646>excess<s%> and <S%H9513>vomit<s%> it.
Let your <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H3365>rarely<s%> be in your neighbor's <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> he <S%H7646>become<s%> <S%H7646>weary<s%> of you and <S%H8130>hate<s%> you.

[Like] a <S%H4650>club<s%> and a <S%H2719>sword<s%> and a <S%H8150>sharp<s%> <S%H2671>arrow<s%> Is a <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6030>bears<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>
[Like] a <S%H9570>bad<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> and an <S%H4571>unsteady<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> Is <S%H4009>confidence<s%> in a <S%H898>faithless<s%> man in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

[Like] one who <S%H9380>takes<s%> <S%H9380>off<s%> a <S%H899>garment<s%> on a <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> [or like] <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> on <S%H5427>soda,<s%> Is he who <S%H7891>sings<s%> <S%H7892>songs<s%> to a <S%H7451>troubled<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> your <S%H8130>enemy<s%> is <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> <S%H398>give<s%> him <S%H3899>food<s%> to <S%H398>eat;<s%> And <S%H518>if<s%> he is <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> <S%H8248>give<s%> him <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink;<s%>
For you will <S%H2846>heap<s%> burning <S%H1513>coals<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H9608>reward<s%> you.
The <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H9123>brings<s%> <S%H9123>forth<s%> <S%H1653>rain,<s%> And a <S%H5643>backbiting<s%> <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> an <S%H2194>angry<s%> <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in a <S%H6438>corner<s%> of the <S%H1406>roof<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2267>shared<s%> with a <S%H4066>contentious<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>
[Like] <S%H7119>cold<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to a <S%H5889>weary<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> So is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8052>news<s%> from a <S%H4801>distant<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

[Like] a <S%H7511>trampled<s%> <S%H4599>spring<s%> and a <S%H7843>polluted<s%> <S%H4726>well<s%> Is a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> who <S%H4131>gives<s%> <S%H4131>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> is it <S%H9202>glory<s%> to <S%H2714>search<s%> out one's own <S%H9202>glory.<s%>
